description:
Akiba Rika is a seventeen-year-old girl, but has been hospitalized throughout most of her life due to a weak heart valve that also affected her father and ultimately killed him. Due to this prolonged hospitalization, she is without friends and spends her time reading books by her favorite author, Ryuunosuke Akutagawa. She has a close relationship with Dr. Natsume, which is a source of tension in her relationship with http://anidb.net/ch8539 [Yuuichi].
-Wikipedia
name: Akiba Rika
